name: Sign
description:
A story about my struggles through depression. Signs can't always be obvious.

Mechanics: Capture the colored "balls" to hear some hidden conversations.

Where am I? Why? How did this happen again?

This project has been around for years and I have personally struggled for far longer. However, I believe this is my first step of relieve. It's time for me to move on.

If any of you struggles with depression, please seek help.

If you have attempted something unimaginable and survived, remember that you are a survivor.

If you have ever thought of attempting but didnt, you are not a coward.

This game was dedicated for a dear friend of mine that I can't show this game to. This is for you.

Please do not hesitate to notify me for any issues or updates you want to see.

Donations are welcomed but not enforced.

You can support the project by purchasing the downloadable version that contains a slightly different player model as a thank-you note.

Any donations receive will be used to try to spread this game around such as Steam.  I believe game is a great medium to spread our personal stories. And here is mine! Would love to play/read about anyone else's story.
